channel.title: I need help badly
channel.description: ok, i would like to know how to add a donator status in my server, and how would i make ::yell command only for DONATER+? If anybody could reply ASAP with a tut or link to one, it would help a lot. Thanks.

item.title: I need help badly
item.dc:creator: @zech2005007 zech2005007
item.description:
@zech2005007 wrote:

trigger, can you tell me where it goes? do i just declare it? or do i have to put it under something? and how would i make a new right for the donaters?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 07:01:06 pm[/size][hr]common Trigger* i need help… plz…

Read full topic

item.title: I need help badly
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

@tonypker13

Yes they will, most commands are like >= number

Read full topic

item.title: I need help badly
item.dc:creator: @zech2005007 zech2005007
item.description:
@zech2005007 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:6, topic:231910”][quote author=zech2005007 link=topic=305489.msg2448729#msg2448729 date=1221870165]
no, im talking about like then they do ::yell it shows [DONATER] (name), like that, and i want to know how to make it where i can just make them donator without giving them like mod status and permissions, like they can only do yell. any help?
[/quote]

Make a player right and only make the yell code for that right…
they wont have any other commands so it’s not that hard…[/quote]

well post how to make a new right, and someone post how to make them one, like, if (command.startsWith(“givemod”)

Read full topic

item.title: I need help badly
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

zech2005007:

no, im talking about like then they do ::yell it shows [DONATER] (name), like that, and i want to know how to make it where i can just make them donator without giving them like mod status and permissions, like they can only do yell. any help?

Make a player right and only make the yell code for that right…
they wont have any other commands so it’s not that hard…

item.title: I need help badly
item.dc:creator: @zech2005007 zech2005007
item.description:
@zech2005007 wrote:

[quote=“Trigger*, post:4, topic:231910”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=305489.msg2447758#msg2447758 date=1221827379]
that would probably mean making a new player right and setting ::yell to it.
[/quote]
Lol…
Add

int donater;

Make it save…

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { if (donater == 1) { //statements } }[/quote]

could you like tell me where? i know where the command goes, but where does int donater; go?

Read full topic

that would probably mean making a new player right and setting ::yell to it.
